text: Davide Drei (born 22 January 1965 in Forlì) is an Italian politician. He is a member of the Democratic Party and he was elected Mayor of Forlì on 25 May 2014 and took his office on 28 May. His term as mayor ended on 11 June 2019. Drei served as President of the Province of Forlì-Cesena from 2014 to 2018. ==References== ==See also== *2014 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Forlì ==External links== * * Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Forlì Category:Democratic Party (Italy) politicians Category:Presidents of the Province of Forlì-Cesena
title: Davide Drei
